title: Qesa story
subject_group: Economics, Philosophy, Politics, Religion & Sociology/Immigrants - Australia
Economics, Philosophy, Politics, Religion & Sociology/Australia - Emigration and immigration
abstract: The role of Qesa in the migrant experience
description: Qesa means story in Arabic and Yvonne Kyriakos from the Craig Family Centre believes that it is the stories that come with the newly arrived communities that helps them to connect not only with their own communities but also with their new communities. The Centre offers support and assistance with empathy, respect and appreciation of these stories which share past experiences, cultures and traditions.
part_of_compliation_title_or_vod_package: Compilation title; B1006939; Qesa: stories from the Craig Family Centre; Active; 2005
